briefTitle: Biomarkers in Tissue Samples From Patients With Ductal Breast Carcinoma in Situ
officialTitle: A Correlative Science Study for ECOG E5194
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Ipsilateral local failure (first event of invasive or DCIS recurrence)
eligibilityCriteria:
DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS:

* Diagnosis of ductal breast carcinoma in situ
* Enrolled on clinical trial ECOG-E5194

  * Local surgery without radiotherapy
  * Treated or not treated with tamoxifen
* Available tissue samples
* Hormone receptor status not specified

PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS:

* Menopausal status not specified

PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY:

* See Disease Characteristics
